bio: A platform for onchain podcasts. Discover, listen, and collect your favorite podcasts and earn status and rewards in return.
contributionDescription:
We deployed Pods natively on Optimism in late September. 

Since then, we’ve released 12+ episodes onchain across multiple creators during our private beta, including:

OP Radio
Invest in Music
Seed Club

These episodes have culminated nearly 700 mints across 250 unique collector since our release ~1 month ago .

contributionLinks.description: Example Mint Page - Invest in Music. View all other episodes on the page.
Example Mint Page - Seed Club Demo Day.

impactDescription:
We’re the only platform focused solely on podcasts, and deployed natively on Optimism. 

In addition to the existing episodes, we have committed dozens of creators in the past few months to releasing episodes on the platform, including Bankless, The Defiant, Overpriced Jpegs, Green Pill, Alfalfa, Rehash, and more. 

Given the novelty of the platform, Pods is targeting and bringing in an entirely new audience the ecosystem -- notably with strong distribution across major crypto podcasts.

fundingSources.description: We charge a small 0.0007 ETH platform fee per mint for sybil resistance.
